steps.plaintext: Enter the mines of The Chasm

substeps.plaintext: The quest marker is located at the elevator, though players can jump into The Chasm's Maw directly.
substeps.markdown: The quest marker is located at the elevator, though players can jump into ◀The Chasm's Maw▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Chasm%27s_Maw▷ directly.

steps.plaintext: Go to the designated location to investigate
steps.markdown: Go to the designated location to investigate

steps.plaintext: Investigate the Lumenspar near the camp
Look for clues as to Uncle He's whereabouts (0/3)
steps.markdown: Look for clues as to Uncle He's whereabouts (0/3)

substeps.plaintext: Have to fight some Treasure Hoarders and a Geovishap.
substeps.markdown: Have to fight some ◀Treasure Hoarders▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Treasure_Hoarder▷ and a ◀Geovishap▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Geovishap▷.

steps.plaintext: Tell Jinwu about what you've discovered of Uncle He's whereabouts
steps.markdown: Tell ◀Jinwu▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Jinwu▷ about what you've discovered of Uncle He's whereabouts

steps.plaintext: Go to the exploration team's camp
steps.markdown: Go to the exploration team's camp

substeps.plaintext: Completion of this step reveals the map areas for Ad-Hoc Main Tunnel and The Chasm: Main Mining Area.
substeps.markdown: Completion of this step reveals the map areas for ◀Ad-Hoc Main Tunnel▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ad-Hoc_Main_Tunnel▷ and ◀The Chasm: Main Mining Area▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Chasm:_Main_Mining_Area▷.

substeps.plaintext: Completion of this step also unlocks Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant.
substeps.markdown: Completion of this step also unlocks ◀Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Enhance_the_Lumenstone_Adjuvant▷.

steps.plaintext: Look for Zhiqiong, who went off on her own
steps.markdown: Look for ◀Zhiqiong▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Zhiqiong▷, who went off on her own

substeps.plaintext: Complete both First Miasmic Contact and Meeting New People... and Foiling Some Bandits quests in any order.
substeps.markdown: Complete both ◀First Miasmic Contact▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/First_Miasmic_Contact▷ and ◀Meeting New People... and Foiling Some Bandits▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Meeting_New_People..._and_Foiling_Some_Bandits▷ quests in any order.

steps.plaintext: Return to the exploration team's camp
steps.markdown: Return to the exploration team's camp
